title: About
description: I’m a student and software developer based out of Boston, MA and San Francisco, CA. As an undergraduate at Northeastern University, I’m majoring in computer science, with a concentration in software and minor in industrial engineering. Beyond my coursework, I spend my time cycling, cooking, and working on a few personal projects.

I'm currently looking for software internship opportunities for the spring and summer of next year. I would love to join a growth-focused company with a strong engineering team and collaborative culture. If there are any opportunities you would like to share, or anything else you would like to talk about, feel free to reach out.
